input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System, 13-Foot,Hercules,LS234H" />

Item features:
Meets all applicable OSHA requirements
Exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks
Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports
Super Lightweight
Meets or Exceeds All Applicable Requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI
input_text.Response A: For the ultimate experience in safety, confidence, versatility, and portability all in one value-packed ladder system, look no further than the new Hercules Ladder System. With Hercules' massive, die-cast aluminum, spring-loaded rung locks, the two outer telescopic sections slide and lock to any required height in 1-foot increments. The Hercules Ladder System is constructed from corrosion-resistant 6063 T-6 Marine Grade Aluminum extrusions. Additional safety features include wide, flared base legs, anti-skid feet and deeply serrated rung surfaces, making the Hercules Ladder System the most unbeatable ladder buy anywhere! The Hercules ladder system meets all applicable OSHA requirements.
input_text.Response B:
A14.2, OSHA, and IBC Codes

Attention
Looking for a ladder that meets OSHA standards and is easy to use? Look no further! The Hercules LS234H is a type II 225-pound duty rated multi-position ladder system that is safe, stable, and easy to use.

Interest
With its exclusive patented stainless steel hinge locks and exclusive anti-twist truss brace supports, the Hercules LS234H is engineered for exceptional stability and safety. It also features a super lightweight design, making it easy to transport and store.

Desire
With the Hercules LS234H, you can tackle any job with confidence, knowing that you have a reliable and safe ladder that meets all applicable requirements. Its innovative design and durability make it the perfect choice for any homeowner or professional.

Action
Order the Hercules LS234H today and experience the difference in quality and safety. With its exceptional features and versatility, it is sure to become your go-to ladder for all of your projects.
